home.title: Vom Platzl
home.subtitle: Discover the best places near you
home.aboutText: Vom Platzl helps you find local alternatives to the products you're searching for online. More and more people are ordering their products online, yet local shops offer and support so much more. With Vom Platzl, you can discover local businesses that provide exactly what you need, allowing you to strengthen the local economy. Start your search above!

about.subtitle: Meet the team behind the project.

download.title: Download
download.subtitle: Get the Vom Platzl browser extension and start discovering local stores today.
download.cardDescription: Available for Chrome and Firefox. Install directly from the GitHub repository.

milestones.title: Hackathon
milestones.description: Our team meets at hackaTUM in Munich and builds the first version of Vom Platzl. This version won first place among 241 other teams.

milestones.title: Polish & Homepage
milestones.description: After the hackathon we continue improving the app, refine the UI, and launch this homepage to introduce Vom Platzl to a wider audience. The extension is now built with React and the backend has been made more efficient.

milestones.title: Chrome Web Store Release
milestones.description: The first version of the extension is published on the Chrome Web Store. Users can now install Vom Platzl and discover local alternatives while shopping online.

milestones.title: Integration with Local Stores
milestones.description: Long-term, we want to let users access more detailed information about local shops — such as current offers and live inventory. We plan partnerships with local businesses and integration of their data into our platform.
